segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, she might as well be in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading over the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but her face is completely blank.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall any second now, and she won’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever look up from that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
